favoriteMeals.name: Chicken and Tomato Stir-Fry
favoriteMeals.description: A quick and easy stir-fry recipe that combines tender chicken and tomatoes with a savory soy-based sauce.
favoriteMeals.instructions: In a wok or skillet, heat vegetable oil. Add garlic and ginger, then chicken. Stir-fry until cooked. Add sliced tomatoes and bell pepper. Pour in soy sauce and cook until heated through. Serve hot.

sharedMeals.name: Cheesy Beef Breakfast Burrito
sharedMeals.description: A hearty breakfast burrito filled with beef, onions, and melted cheese.
sharedMeals.instructions: Cook beef and onions in a skillet until browned. Add cheese and stir until melted. Fill a tortilla with the mixture and roll it up. Serve hot.
